title: Does anyone have this book?
content:
Looking to buy or borrow this book—-checked World Cat and no libraries show it.

Type Design in the Digital Realm  
by Charles Bigelow and Kris Holmes?  
Wiley,1999

Thanks

 [‹ Article & interview of Kris Sowersby in Sunday Star Times](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122104955/http:/www.typophile.com/node/48139 "Go to previous forum topic") [Where are the calligraphic origins of Humanist Sans type? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122104955/http:/www.typophile.com/node/48078 "Go to next forum topic")
author: nstockallen

comments.content:
I could not find it either, but if you contact Timothy Hawley he may have it or be able to find it for you.

Timothy Hawley Books

\* Books: specialty

\* P.O. Box 5277  
 Louisville, KY USA 40255-0277  
 \* Tel 502-451-3021

Timothy Hawley Books has been buying and selling books through mail order for over 20 years. Long a specialist in Fine Printing, Private Press Books, Books About Books (especially books about Printing and the Book Arts), Type Specimens, and Bibliography, several new and equally esoteric specialties have been added. We accept international orders. Write for free catalogues of Books About Books and Fine Printing.

George

Check out this old TYPO-L thread... Apparently the book was never published. Wouldn’t be the first time.
